Deprecated API

Contents

  • Terminally Deprecated
  • Fields
  • Methods
  • Terminally Deprecated Elements
    Element
    Description
    com.codeborne.selenide.appium.AppiumDriverRunner.getAndroidDriver()
    instead of retrieving AndroidDriver, cast your WebDriver to the needed interface, e.g. SupportsRotation or HidesKeyboard.
    com.codeborne.selenide.appium.AppiumDriverRunner.getIosDriver()
    instead of retrieving IOSDriver, cast your WebDriver to the needed interface, e.g. SupportsRotation or HidesKeyboard.
    com.codeborne.selenide.appium.AppiumDriverRunner.getMobileDriver()
    instead of retrieving AndroidDriver, cast your WebDriver to the needed interface, e.g. SupportsRotation or HidesKeyboard.
    com.codeborne.selenide.impl.Photographer.takeScreenshot(Driver, OutputType<T>)
    Override method Photographer.takeScreenshot(WebDriver, OutputType) instead
    com.codeborne.selenide.impl.WebdriverUnwrapper.cast(Driver, Class<T>)
    instead of using this method, just cast your WebDriver to the needed interface, e.g. JavascriptExecutor or TakesScreenshot.
    com.codeborne.selenide.impl.WebdriverUnwrapper.cast(SearchContext, Class<T>)
    instead of using this method, just cast your WebDriver to the needed interface, e.g. JavascriptExecutor or TakesScreenshot.
    com.codeborne.selenide.impl.WebdriverUnwrapper.instanceOf(Driver, Class<T>)
    instead of using this method, just cast your WebDriver to the needed interface, e.g. JavascriptExecutor or TakesScreenshot.
    com.codeborne.selenide.impl.WebdriverUnwrapper.instanceOf(SearchContext, Class<T>)
    instead of using this method, just cast your WebDriver to the needed interface, e.g. JavascriptExecutor or TakesScreenshot.
    com.codeborne.selenide.impl.WebdriverUnwrapper.unwrap(SearchContext)
    instead of using this method, just cast your WebDriver to the needed interface, e.g. JavascriptExecutor or TakesScreenshot.
  • Deprecated Fields
    Field
    Description
    com.codeborne.selenide.Configuration.holdBrowserOpen
    Don't use this setting. It leaves the browser and webdriver open. User can later close the browser manually, but the webdriver leaves running forever. To achieve the same effect, just add `sleep(600_000)` in your test.
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    com.codeborne.selenide.appium.AppiumDriverRunner.getAndroidDriver()
    instead of retrieving AndroidDriver, cast your WebDriver to the needed interface, e.g. SupportsRotation or HidesKeyboard.
    com.codeborne.selenide.appium.AppiumDriverRunner.getIosDriver()
    instead of retrieving IOSDriver, cast your WebDriver to the needed interface, e.g. SupportsRotation or HidesKeyboard.
    com.codeborne.selenide.appium.AppiumDriverRunner.getMobileDriver()
    instead of retrieving AndroidDriver, cast your WebDriver to the needed interface, e.g. SupportsRotation or HidesKeyboard.
    com.codeborne.selenide.appium.AppiumScrollOptions.getMaxSwipeCounts()
    Use AppiumScrollOptions.getMaxSwipeCount() instead
    com.codeborne.selenide.Config.holdBrowserOpen()
    Don't use this setting. It leaves the browser and webdriver open. User can later close the browser manually, but the webdriver leaves running forever.
    com.codeborne.selenide.FluentCommand.execute(SelenideElement, WebElementSource, Object[])
    It's easier to override method FluentCommand.execute(WebElementSource, Object[]) instead.
    com.codeborne.selenide.impl.Photographer.takeScreenshot(Driver, OutputType<T>)
    Override method Photographer.takeScreenshot(WebDriver, OutputType) instead
    com.codeborne.selenide.impl.WebdriverUnwrapper.cast(Driver, Class<T>)
    instead of using this method, just cast your WebDriver to the needed interface, e.g. JavascriptExecutor or TakesScreenshot.

    instead of using this method, just cast your WebDriver to the needed interface, e.g. JavascriptExecutor or TakesScreenshot.

    instead of using this method, just cast your WebDriver to the needed interface, e.g. JavascriptExecutor or TakesScreenshot.

    instead of using this method, just cast your WebDriver to the needed interface, e.g. JavascriptExecutor or TakesScreenshot.
    com.codeborne.selenide.impl.WebdriverUnwrapper.unwrap(SearchContext)
    instead of using this method, just cast your WebDriver to the needed interface, e.g. JavascriptExecutor or TakesScreenshot.
    com.codeborne.selenide.SelenideConfig.holdBrowserOpen()
    com.codeborne.selenide.SelenideConfig.holdBrowserOpen(boolean)
    com.codeborne.selenide.SelenideElement.download(long)
    Use method {SelenideElement.download(DownloadOptions)} instead
    com.codeborne.selenide.SelenideElement.download(long, FileFilter)
    Use method {SelenideElement.download(DownloadOptions)} instead
    com.codeborne.selenide.SelenideElement.scrollIntoView(boolean)
    The boolean parameter is not well-readable. We recommend using method SelenideElement.scrollIntoView(ScrollIntoViewOptions) instead:
    1. replace $.scrollIntoView(true) by $.scrollIntoView(instant().block(start))
    2. replace $.scrollIntoView(false) by $.scrollIntoView(instant().block(end))
    Option instant() ignores "scroll-behavior" and performs the scrolling instantly.
    com.codeborne.selenide.SelenideElement.scrollIntoView(String)
    The String parameter is not convenient to write. We recommend using method SelenideElement.scrollIntoView(ScrollIntoViewOptions) instead:
    1. $.scrollIntoView(instant().block(start))
    2. $.scrollIntoView(instant().block(end).inline(nearest))
    Option instant() ignores "scroll-behavior" and performs the scrolling instantly.
    com.codeborne.selenide.WebDriverRunner.closeWebDriver()
    Use method Selenide.closeWebDriver() instead
